mapper.sql: id, label, parent_id, parent_name, code, path, name, url, type, icon, create_time, update_time, remark, order_num, is_delete
mapper.select: select distinct t5.id,t5.`parent_id`,t5.`label`,t5.`code`,t5.`url`,t5.`type`,t5.`icon`,t5.`remark`,t5.`path`,t5.name from sys_user t1 left join sys_user_role t2 on t2.user_id = t1.id left join sys_role t3 on t3.id = t2.role_id left join sys_role_permission t4 on t4.role_id = t3.id left join sys_permission t5 on t5.id = t4.permission_id where t1.id = #{userId} order by t5.id
select * from sys_permission t1 inner join sys_role_permission t2 on t2.permission_id = t1.id where t2.role_id = #{roleId}
